pr_title: Handle the case where a partition column has null value

timeline.message: Handle the case where a partition column has null value

timeline.bodyText: nit: can you use ImmutableMap.Builder so that the code style is consistent with Presto codebase?
timeline.author: lxynov

replies.bodyText: The Guava Immutable classes can’t contain null values, but HashMap can.
replies.author: electrum
